dialog.text: There are trees in the middle portion of the image, below the trees there are grass
Are there rocks on the ground? Are there other landmarks in the background?
There are no rocks on the ground. The grass occupies almost the bottom half of the image. The grass is pale green in color, with a patch of grass particularly reddish.
Where is the red patch of grass located?
The red patch of grass is just below the trees, spanning across from the left to right edge
The trees span across the whole width of the image. They are not very dense, and in the left top corner of the image there are some tree branches with no leaves.
Is there anything else in the image besides the grass, trees, and sky?
Can you make the trees much denser I think I didn't describe it accurately, There are only trees, grass, and sky on the image. Also, there are some clouds on the right half of the sky
Could you describe the tree height?
The trees height are pretty even, they are all similar height. It would be the height of your tallest tree right now, slightly shorter.
Do the clouds have a defined shape?
The clouds spread behind the trees at the right half. It is a big heavy cloud spanning from the rightmost treetop to a bit cross the middle tree.
What is the color of the sky?
The sky is bright blue. It's a very sunny day with clouds.
